summary: Simple re-texture to create a new drink for the game- Jack Daniel\'s Whisky.
descriptionHtml:
[color=White][center][size=8][font=\"Impact\"]Jack Daniel\'s Whiskey[/font][/size][/center][/color]

[color=Red][b][u]Please note that this is a \"Just for fun\" mod. It is not to be taken seriously, and it quite frankly pointless, but please enjoy nonetheless![/b][/u][/color]

You will be able to purchase the Whiskey from most Bartenders in Skyrim, or alternatively you can find some bottles on a shelf behind the bar in the \"Sleeping Giant inn\" ins Riverwood.

[b]To install this mod, simple download the .rar file and extract \"JackDanielsWhiskey.esp\" and \"JackDanielsWhiskey.bsa\" to your DATA folder. [/b]
author: samv96UK
